Searching for Specific Text with Visual Merge

In any pane of the Visual Merge window, you can search for specific text.

To search for text in Visual Merge:

  1. Click the pane that contains the file.

  2. Select Search > Find from the menu, or click the Find button on the toolbar. The Find dialog opens.

  3. Enter the text you want to locate in the Find what text box.

  4. (Optional) Select Match case for a case-sensitive search.

  5. Select Up or Down as the direction for the search.

  6. Click Find Next.
